Package JavaCool303

Class Cool303Container

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaCool303.Cool303Container
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cool303Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cool303Root
    public class Cool303Container
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cool303Component
    Wraps Swing JPanel, implements Cool303Component.

    April 9 2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Le Nhat Hung

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cool303Container

        public Cool303Container()
        Constructor. Sets default size. Object without a title is just one JPanel.

      • Cool303Container

        public Cool303Container​(java.lang.String title)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor. Sets default size. Object with title is one big JPanel in border layout.

        The North holds the title and the Center holds another content JPanel in flow layout.

        Adding to object will be adding into the content JPanel

        Parameters:
        title -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • Method Detail

      • enableBgColor

        public void enableBgColor​(boolean bool)
        If set to true, Container's background will have a theme associated color.

        If false, Container's background will be transparent / default Java grey.

        Parameters:
        bool -

      • add

        public void add​(Cool303Component c)
        Adds a component into content JPanel and components array list.

        If a new Cool303Component is added into this current Cool303Container,

        then the method notifies the parent Cool303Root which will then repaint everything.

        Parameters:
        c - Cool303Component

      • remove

        public void remove​(int i)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Remove a component from content JPanel and components array list.
        Parameters:
        i - index
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • removeAll

        public void removeAll()
        Remove all components from content JPanel and components array list.

      • register

        public void register​(Cool303Container parentContainer)
        Called when Cool303Container is added into a Cool303Root.

        Registers Cool303Container to its Cool303Root.

        Specified by:
        register in interface Cool303Component
        Parameters:
        parentContainer -

      • paint

        public void paint​(Cool303Theme theme)
        Paints JPanel's background with theme associated color.

        Iterates through components array list and calls each component's paint(theme).

        Specified by:
        paint in interface Cool303Component
        Parameters:
        theme -

      • getChildren

        java.util.ArrayList<Cool303Component> getChildren()
        Return the components array list. Serves Cool303Root's ability to adjust for minimum size for every aggregated Cool303Containers.
        Returns:
        components array list

      • getComponent

        public java.awt.Component getComponent()

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        panel JPanel
